summary: This are a few Retexture of the original File "Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit" (Original Mod is Required)
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff7700]ABOUT[/color][/b]


This is my second Retexture, mainly wanted more elvish looking clothes in white, so decided to recolor to my own taste.



[b][color=#ff7700]REQUIREMENTS[/color][/b]


You need the Original armor mod "Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit" to use this retex:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387



[b][color=#ff7700]INSTALL[/color][/b]


After you installed the original Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit, just unpack this file into DATA folder located inside Main Skyrim Folder, replace any files as prompted.



[color=yellow][b][size=3]CHECK MY OTHER RETEXTURES:[/size][/b][/color]


[b]theRoadstrokers Royal Elven Set White Brown Retex [/b]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25352/

[b]Ashara Princess of the Wood White and Brown Retexture[/b]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32101

[b]Fur Huntress Armor Gray-Brown Retexture[/b]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/edit/?id=32095



[color=yellow][b][size=3]Check out my other Mods:[/size][/b][/color]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10175/?



[b][color=#ff7700]CREDITS[/color][/b]


Backsteppo for allowing permission to do the retex and creating the original file.
author: EtaYorius and Backsteppo
